long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly fetch detailed Facebook profile information and export to CSV with one click.
Export detailed information about users, such as location, language with Ease Using FB Profile Info.

Easily fetch detailed Facebook profile information with FB Profile Info. Designed for efficiency, this tool lets you fetch user details in bulk using either profile URLs or user IDs. Perfect for marketers, researchers, or businesses looking to streamline data collection from Facebook.
 
🚀 Key Features:
✓ Bulk User Details Fetching: Quickly extract detailed profile information for multiple Facebook users at once.
✓ Profile-Based Export: Use user IDs or profile URLs for targeted exports  
✓ Flexible Input Options: Add users manually or upload CSV/Excel files for streamlined batch processing.
✓ Customizable Requests: Ensure smooth, safe request sending

# Supported Fields:
- ID
- Name
- Gender
- Avatar URL
- Profile URL
- Age
- Birthday
- Hometown
- Location
- Languages
- Locale

# Why Choose FB Profile Info:
🚀 Boost Efficiency: No more manual lookups—fetch detailed user information in seconds.
💡 User-Friendly: Intuitive design ensures smooth operation for all skill levels.
⚙️ Customizable Requests: Adapt settings to extract the exact data you need.
🔐 Data Security: All data remains local, ensuring 100% privacy and safety.
📊 Perfect for Professionals: Streamline research, marketing, and analysis with ease.

# How to Get Started:
1. Click the extension icon and click the 'Open the APP' button
2. Input Facebook user IDs or profile URLs, or upload a CSV/Excel file.
3. Start your request and export detailed profile datas instantly!

📬 FAQ:
Having trouble? Describe the issue and send a screenshot to our support team for troubleshooting assistance.

Instagram Permission Description:
This extension utilizes the GraphQL API to fetch data for each provided user ID, including details like name, profile picture, and profile link. To enable seamless operation of the GraphQL API, the extension requires authorization from https://instagram.com to process GraphQL interface requests.

🔐 Data Privacy:
Your privacy is our priority. All data is securely stored locally on your device, ensuring complete confidentiality.

⭐ About Pro:
FB Profile Info offers basic features for free, including a free quota. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited requests and maximize your productivity!
